publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5212 Murdo Fraser: The Enchanted Forest and the Pitlochry Autumn Festival—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers, Perthshire Big Tree Country and the Pitlochry Partnership, for the success of The Enchanted Forest and the Pitlochry Autumn Festival, which ran from 16 to 31 October 2009; notes that The Enchanted Forest, a sound and light show in the Faskally Wood near Pitlochry that allows visitors to roam around the forest to some spectacular effects and displays, saw record numbers of visitors, and believes that everyone involved in the events can be proud that Highland Perthshire now has one of the best annual tourist events in Scotland.

S3M-5212 Murdo Fraser: The Enchanted Forest and the Pitlochry Autumn Festival—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers, Perthshire Big Tree Country and the Pitlochry Partnership, for the success of The Enchanted Forest and the Pitlochry Autumn Festival, which ran from 16 to 31 October 2009; notes that The Enchanted Forest, a sound and light show in the Faskally Wood near Pitlochry that allows visitors to roam around the forest to some spectacular effects and displays, saw record numbers of visitors, and believes that everyone involved in the events can be proud that Highland Perthshire now has one of the best annual tourist events in Scotland.
